Title: Carry on the struggle to the end to strike against the right deviationist wind of reversing verdicts
Publisher: Hunan renmin chubanshe (湖南人民出版社)
Notes: One of the last campaigns engineered by the Gang of Four during the Cultural Revolution was the one to criticize Rightist Deviationism in Spring 1976. The immediate target of the Gang's campaign was Deng Xiaoping.
